group_1.textRight: Since we don't know where Mitsune is...
We wanted to ask the instructor for help, since@she's more familiar with Takarazaki, but...

group_1.textLeft: I haven't heard back from her since then, so@I don't think she'll be able to help today...
Those two have got the Youth Association to search@for, and we've got Miwarin.
It's a race against time to see if they're safe,@and we've both got it really bad.

group_1.textRight: Mitsune must be pushing herself for atonement...
We've got to stop her before she breaks down...

group_1.textLeft: Her Doppel won't come out if she's in@Takarazaki... We have to hurry...
It looks like Miwarin's been keeping updated@on her account.
"I have a feeling there will be dangerous crimes@in Takarazaki today."
"I'll pwn the bad Witch that would cause them@and prevent them from happening again."
It would be totally cringy to read this if you're not@in the know...

group_1.textRight: So she's planning to fight a Witch causing crime...

group_1.textLeft: I mean, isn't it totally naive posting this stuff after@messing with our heads to make us forget her?

group_1.textRight: Maybe she wants to be found...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe, but if that's the case, she's making it@way too complicated.
But then again, that kind of subconscious@crying out for attention...
That's just what's so cute about Miwarin.

group_1.textRight: What's up with you, all of a sudden...?

group_1.textCenter: She's probably talking to her boyfriend...

group_1.textRight: I have no clue what you're talking about.

group_1.textCenter: ...But, I also wonder whether her posts are really@just to get attention...
Is she really making the posts because she wants@to be found, or...?

group_1.textRight: I was wondering about that, too.
Since she's never posted anything like that before.

group_1.textCenter: It might be a way for her to firm her resolve...
Like, how a criminal posts a declaration on a@message board...

group_1.textRight: But, if that's true, the Witch might be a@real deadly one...

group_1.textLeft: Well, let's start with the most likely places to@find a strong Witch.
This is also a good time to use the@Crime Information Map.
